Class.name: HTML.Attribute
Class.Description: One HTML Node attribute Simple explanation: http://www.w3schools.com/html/html_attributes.asp HTML language reference: https://www.w3.org/TR/html-markup/global-attributes.html TODO: There must never be two or more attributes on the same start tag whose names are a case-insensitive match for each other. TODO: Where do Global Attributes go? Here? To the node? Both places.

Property.name: Value
Property.Description: Attribute value Restriction upon attribute values: https://www.w3.org/TR/html-markup/syntax.html#syntax-attribute-value

Property.name: Node
Property.Description: Node, in which this attribute exists

Property.name: Document
Property.Description: Node, in which this attribute exists

Property.name: StreamPosition
Property.Description: Position of this attribute from the beginning of the stream
